text: Evi Strasser (born 13 February 1964) is a Canadian equestrian. She competed in two events at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Canada Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 2003 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Canada Category:People from Traunstein (district)
title: Evi Strasser
